metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7068 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
In PHP versions 7.2.x below 7.2.33, 7.3.x below 7.3.21 and 7.4.x below 7.4.9, while processing PHAR files using phar extension, phar_parse_zipfile could be tricked into accessing freed memory, which could lead to a crash or information disclosure.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-7068` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php8.0 - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
libphp8.0-embed - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0 - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-bcmath - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-bz2 - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-cgi - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-cli - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-common - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-curl - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-dba - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-enchant - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-fpm - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-gd - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-gmp - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1

php8.0-interbase - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-intl - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-ldap - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-mbstring - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-mysql - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-odbc - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-opcache - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-pgsql - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-phpdbg - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-pspell - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-readline - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-snmp - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-soap - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-sqlite3 - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-sybase - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-tidy - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-xml - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-xsl - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
php8.0-zip - 8.0.5-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php8.0 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.0.5-1ubuntu1').
